text: Sir Daniel Charles Williams (4 November 1935 – 2 October 2024) was a Grenadian politician. He was a Governor-General of Grenada, from 8 August 1996 until 27 November 2008. He was formally appointed by Queen Elizabeth II on 9 August 1996 after having been nominated by Prime Minister Keith Mitchell. Williams died on 2 October 2024 in St. George's, Grenada at the age of 88.Grenada’s former GG Sir Daniel Williams has died ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Governors-General of Grenada
title: Daniel Williams (governor-general)
